verses.roman:
śrī-caitanya-nityānanda-advaita-caraṇa
yāṅra prāṇa-dhana, sei pāya ei dhana

synonyms: śrī-caitanya-nityānanda-advaita-caraṇa—the lotus feet of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Lord Nityānanda and Advaita Prabhu; yāṅra prāṇa-dhana—whose life and soul; sei—such a person; pāya—gets; ei dhana—this treasure-house of devotional service.
translation: The conclusion of this chapter can be known to one whose life and soul are the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Nityānanda Prabhu and Advaita Prabhu.
